h2_title: The Four Heavenly Kings and Erlan Shang
content: When the battle with Erlang, the Sacred Divinity is over, you'll then need to take on The Four Heavenly Kings. The final part of this epic battle is to take on Erlang Shen.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Secret_Bosses_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md', within the main section titled 'Secret Bosses in Chapter 6', specifically from the subsection 'The Four Heavenly Kings and Erlan Shang'.
The content is as follows:
When the battle with Erlang, the Sacred Divinity is over, you'll then need to take on The Four Heavenly Kings. The final part of this epic battle is to take on Erlang Shen.
